name: AppNexusOASSDKBitCode
description: AppNexus|OAS SDK Released on 13-Aug-2015 delivers ads to apple devices. It supports standard, RichMedia Banner and Interstitial ads. It supports Vast Formats and Preroll ads. Supports Client-Side Mediation with AppNexus at the backend.
